Class java.Nutmeg.NAssociation

  Class java.Nutmeg.NAssociation



java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.Nutmeg.NAssociation






  
 public class NAssociation
  
 extends Object


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

NAssociation class (a key, value association class).

Used by NDictionary to manage key/value associations.





  




  
 
	NAssociation(Object)
  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
  
 
	NAssociation(Object, Object)
  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
  
 
	NAssociation()
  
 Construct an empty Association.




  




  
 
	clone()
  
 Clone this NAssociation.
  
 
	equal(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is equal to anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  
 
	hash()
  
 Return the hashcode for this association, which for our purposes we
use the hashcode of they key.
  
 
	isEqual(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is equal to anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  
 
	isGreaterThan(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is greater than anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  
 
	isGreaterThanOrEqual(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is greater or equal to anAssociation's key, 
then return true.
  
 
	isLessThan(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is less than anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  
 
	isLessThanOrEqual(NAssociation)
  
 If this association's key is less than or equal to anAssociation's key, 
then return true.
  
 
	key()
  
 Return the contents of the key.
  
 
	key(Object)
  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
  
 
	value()
  
 Return the contents of the value.
  
 
	value(Object)
  
 Set the value Object to aValue's contents.





  




NAssociation

  public NAssociation(Object aKey)




  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
Constructs an association, with the key as a parameter, this defaults
the value to null.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 aKey - the key value
  




NAssociation

  public NAssociation(Object aKey,
                      Object aValue)




  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
Constructs an association, with the key, and value as parameters.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 aKey - the key value.
    
 aValue - the Value to be managed and looked up via the key.
  




NAssociation

  public NAssociation()




  
 Construct an empty Association.





  



isLessThan

  public boolean isLessThan(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is less than anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is less than
anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




isLessThanOrEqual

  public boolean isLessThanOrEqual(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is less than or equal to anAssociation's key, 
then return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is less than
or equal to anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




equal

  public boolean equal(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is equal to anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is equal to
anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




isEqual

  public boolean isEqual(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is equal to anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is equal to
anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




isGreaterThan

  public boolean isGreaterThan(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is greater than anAssociation's key, then
return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is greater than
anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




isGreaterThanOrEqual

  public boolean isGreaterThanOrEqual(NAssociation anAssociation)




  
 If this association's key is greater or equal to anAssociation's key, 
then return true.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 anAssociation - The association to compare with.
    
 Returns:
    
 boolean This is true if this association's key is greater than
or equal to anAssociation's key, else it's false.
  




hash

  public int hash()




  
 Return the hashcode for this association, which for our purposes we
use the hashcode of they key.
  

    
 Returns:
    
 int the hashcode for the key.
  




key

  public Object key()




  
 Return the contents of the key.
  

    
 Returns:
    
 Object the key value.
  




key

  public void key(Object aKey)




  
 NOTE: aKey is of type Sortable so we can easily sort it.
Set the key Object to aKey's value.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 aKey - - the new key for this association.
  




value

  public Object value()




  
 Return the contents of the value.
  

    
 Returns:
    
 Object the value part of the association.
  




value

  public void value(Object aValue)




  
 Set the value Object to aValue's contents.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 aValue - - the new value for this association.
  




clone

  public synchronized Object clone()




  
 Clone this NAssociation. The key and value are not cloned.
  

    
 Overrides:
    
 clone in class Object
